headline.main: Senate Probe Into IRS Targeting of Tea Party Groups Issues Mixed Report
headline.print_headline: Senate Probe Into IRS Targeting of Tea Party Groups Issues Mixed Report

docs.snippet: A U.S. Senate panel that conducted a two-year investigation into a scandal over the targeting of conservative political groups by the Internal Revenue Service issued a report on Wednesday with several bipartisan recommendations....
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. Senate panel that conducted a two-year investigation into a scandal over the targeting of conservative political groups by the Internal Revenue Service issued a report on Wednesday with several bipartisan recommendations.

headline.main: After Tape-Delayed Success, a Mostly Live Olympics for NBC
headline.print_headline: After Tape-Delayed Success, a Mostly Live Olympics for NBC

docs.snippet: A swimmer with a heart-wrenching history is about to race at the Olympics, so of course NBC will first air a slickly produced feature full of teary interviews and stirring music....
docs.lead_paragraph: A swimmer with a heart-wrenching history is about to race at the Olympics, so of course NBC will first air a slickly produced feature full of teary interviews and stirring music.

headline.main: Protesters Mark Year Since Fatal Police Shooting in Wal-Mart
headline.print_headline: Protesters Mark Year Since Fatal Police Shooting in Wal-Mart

docs.snippet: Dozens of protesters have staged a "die-in" outside a closed Ohio Wal-Mart to mark one year since a white police officer fatally shot a black man holding an air rifle on sale inside the store....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens of protesters have staged a "die-in" outside a closed Ohio Wal-Mart to mark one year since a white police officer fatally shot a black man holding an air rifle on sale inside the store.

headline.main: Florida: Sheriff Says 3 Killings May Be Connected to Blue Moon
headline.print_headline: Florida: Sheriff Says 3 Killings May Be Connected to Blue Moon

docs.snippet: The authorities are investigating whether a triple homicide last week was committed as part of a ritualistic ceremony in connection with the recent blue moon....
docs.abstract: Authorities in Florida are examining whether murders of Voncile Smith and her sons Richard and John in Pensacola area were part of ritualistic ceremony related to blue moon.
docs.lead_paragraph: The authorities are investigating whether a triple homicide last week was committed as part of a ritualistic ceremony in connection with the recent blue moon.

headline.main: For Some Republicans, a Trump Victory Looks Increasingly Possible
headline.print_headline: For Some Republicans, a Trump Victory Looks Increasingly Possible

docs.snippet: Four years ago, only one Republican candidate was consistently hitting the same kind of polling heights among the presidential field that real estate mogul Donald Trump is reaching now. His name was Mitt Romney....
docs.lead_paragraph: Four years ago, only one Republican candidate was consistently hitting the same kind of polling heights among the presidential field that real estate mogul Donald Trump is reaching now. His name was Mitt Romney.

headline.print_headline: Riske Upsets No. 10 Suarez Navarro to Reach Quarters

headline.main: Special Report-How Smuggled Workers Power 'Made in China'
headline.print_headline: Special Report-How Smuggled Workers Power 'Made in China'

docs.snippet: On a quiet river bend on the China-Vietnam border, a group of people clambered up a muddy bank. They had just glided across the river from the Vietnamese side in a longboat, guided by men on both banks signalling with flashlights....
docs.lead_paragraph: On a quiet river bend on the China-Vietnam border, a group of people clambered up a muddy bank. They had just glided across the river from the Vietnamese side in a longboat, guided by men on both banks signalling with flashlights.

headline.main: Judge: City Must Pay $259K to Woman Wrongly Called 'Crook'
headline.print_headline: Judge: City Must Pay $259K to Woman Wrongly Called 'Crook'

docs.snippet: The city of Lincoln must pay more than $259,000 to a woman who was wrongly accused by Crime Stoppers and local authorities of making ATM withdrawals with a stolen credit card, a judge in Nebraska ruled Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The city of Lincoln must pay more than $259,000 to a woman who was wrongly accused by Crime Stoppers and local authorities of making ATM withdrawals with a stolen credit card, a judge in Nebraska ruled Wednesday.
